question: Which state going to start door-to-door survey to collect data of every resident, issue smart IDs to every house?
explanation: The Chief Minister of Haryana Manohar Lal Khattar decided to gather a detailed data of every resident and issue a sleek identity for every house in Haryana. The main objective of this scheme is to get details of land holdings and status of facilities such as social security pension, scholarship,MGNREGA, loans and LPG connection.
